name: The PickNicker (online)
description:
Hey yall!

In this game, you will get to understand what's it like to be in my shoes for a day. Hey I'm Nick, And they GOD DAMN mole "People" are stealing all my stuff, making them into picnics! it gets me so ANGRY!!
I have therefore used everything I had in my barn, to make myself a Huwer Machine, to take back what those GOD DAMN mole "people" stole from me!! 
Use the Claw to scoop up my picnics, and by the end, you will become to trustest Pick Nicker there is! See you out there cowboys!

_________________________

WASD or arrows to control the ship, space to nick a picknick

__________________________

Made for Create Jam 2022 Spring.

Lead coder: Theodor Florian Purcaru

Gameplay progermmer: Mads

Sound designer and junior coder: Esben

Art director and 3D artist: Austeja Vaicyte

Technical artist and prop modeler: Morten
